notes.text: We now ensure that the sorting and removal of table columns work correctly
You can now specify function names for beforeRebindTable and selectionChange events in tables used in an adaptation project
You can now specify the sideEffectsEventsInteractionType value in a list report used in an adaptation project
We now correctly evaluate the complex expression for the FieldControl annotations
We now provide a context menu for tree tables
You can now use buttons in the tree table toolbar to move a selected node before its previous sibling or after its next sibling
We now ensure that fields with currencies based on an integer value work correctly in edit mode
We now ensure that columns with a defined scale are exported correctly
In a tree table, you can now show newly created nodes at the position computed by the back end, for example by taking sorting into account
We now display an appropriate message when a subset of rows is updated in the mass edit dialog
Weâ€™ve resolved an issue with showing custom filter fields in the Adapt Filters dialog
We now display an appropriate message when no changes are made in the mass edit dialog
You can now use a manifest parameter to set the default creation mode in tables to InlineCreationRows
You can now specify the operation grouping mode for mass edit changes in the manifest
We now ensure that side effects are applied on radio buttons
We no longer show the technical messages from the default OData V4 model in the message dialog
You can now specify which fields can be included or excluded from the Mass Edit dialog
We now correctly merge the default export settings with the precedence settings from the manifest file for columns with overwritten export settings
We now ensure that the navigate function in the routing controller extension supports the preserveHistory parameter
